name: Soccer Ships
description: A full space experience filled with adrenaline! Pilot a ship with no friction at all in a intense soccer match against a friend (local only). Piloting alone can be a challenge, but to make it even more intense, during a match you can grab 3 different powerups to unlock special abillities to your ship. You can choose from up to 20 different ships, each one with it´s unique flying style.
